format.title: Energise.me Daily Energiser
format.subtitle: Let's see how you are doing by filling out this quick survey! 1 is always the worst possible score and 10 is the best!

1.name: energised_rating
1.title: On a scale of 1-10, how energised do you feel?

2.name: stress_rating
2.title: On a scale of 1-10, how stressed do you feel? (Lower == more stressed)

3.name: productive_rating
3.title: On a scale of 1-10, how productive do you feel?

4.name: form_comments
4.title: Let us know anything that you feel affected your scores
